ISSUE.TITLE: Issue with prices when adding a new product to an order in the admin area
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.70 Steps to reproduce the problem: For some languages, when trying to add a new item to an existing order in the admin area, decimal prices are multiplied Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/100611/issue-after-upgrading-from-4601-to-latest-4704-when-adding-a-new-item-to-an-order This issue is similar to issue #6060

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix issue with prices when adding a new product to an order in the admin area Fixes #7313 Update `OrderService` class to handle decimal prices correctly for different languages. * Modify `InsertOrderItemAsync` and `UpdateOrderItemAsync` methods to ensure proper handling of unit prices and total prices. * Add a method `EnsureProperHandlingOfPrices` in `OrderItem` class to handle decimal values correctly. * Update `AddProductToOrderModel` class to handle decimal prices correctly. * Add a method `EnsureProperHandlingOfOrderTotals` in `Order` class to ensure that order totals are calculated correctly for different languages.
#7313 Fixed parsing of prices and rental dates when adding a product to an order
